name: Survive The Island
description:
survive the island you survive from skeletons and humans 

you can build and mine and level up your stats you can build whatever you want 

you can raid enemies you can mine and cut down trees and you have to hunt for your own food 

and you can grow your own crops and you can craft weapons and building supplies to take the fight to the skeletons and humans 

and to explore the open world and you can pick flowers this game is RPG SURVIVAL CRAFTING BUILDING OPEN-WORLD

and you can unlock magic to kill the skeletons and humans is a fireball you can get bananas and health regen to breathe underwater to called down a meteor

and you can harvest crops
